mapper.select: select p.ord_no as order_no, p.ord_prdt_idx as order_product_seq, p.cnc_bank_cd as refund_bank_code, p.cnc_bank_acnt_no as refund_bank_account_no, p.cnc_rmtr_nm as refund_depositor_name from ord_prdt_info p inner join ord_info o on p.ord_no = o.ord_no where p.ord_no = #{orderNo} and p.prnr_cd = #{partnerCode} and p.ord_prdt_idx = #{orderProductSeq}

-- 주문내역 상세정보 시 결제정보 조회 select s.ord_amt as order_amount, s.dlvr_chrg_amt as delivery_charge_amount, o.ssp_pnt as ssp_point, o.sls_amt as sale_amount, s.pay_amt as payment_amount, o.pym_dt as payment_date, (select max(trsctn_id) from ord_trsctn_info where ord_no = o.ord_no) as approval_no, null as rental_amount, o.pay_meth as payment_method_code, o.pay_meth as payment_method_name, s.pay_stus as payment_status_code, s.pay_stus as payment_status_name from ord_prnr_info s inner join ord_info o on s.ord_no = o.ord_no where s.ord_no = #{orderNo} and s.prnr_cd = #{partnerCode}
mapper.update:
-- 파트너 상품 통합 상태코드 취소요청 처리 update ord_prnr_info set ord_stus = 'O06', pay_stus = 'S06', upd_usr_id = #{userId}, upd_dt = now() where ord_no = #{orderNo} and prnr_cd = #{partnerCode}; -- 주문 상품 상태값 상태코드 취소요청 처리 update ord_prdt_info set ord_prdt_stus = 'O06', ord_prdt_pay_stus = 'S06', cnc_rq_dt = now(), cnc_rsn_cd = #{cancelReasonCode}, upd_usr_id = #{userId}, upd_dt = now() where ord_no = #{orderNo} and prnr_cd = #{partnerCode}
